properties.name: Amelia Island, Florida
properties.description: Posted by SschelleComing in 4th place is Amelia Island. This beach location is awesome. This island is a very laid back place. The night life is almost non-existant. You spend a majority of your time on the complex you are staying at, and the shops close by 9pm every night. If you are looking to shop you are only an hour from Jacksonville, this place is a good place for retirement.

properties.name: Amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by SschelleAmsterdam Comes in 3rd place to vacation at. There are many things you can do, from seeing anne Franks house. After spending a month in amsterdam, i reliezed there were many things you can do here than you can do in america. Amsterdam is historical and a great time.

properties.name: Aruba
properties.description: Posted by SschelleComing in first place on the 10 places to vacation is Aruba. Aruba is very relaxing and is a great place to go. the beaches are great, the water is clear, and the food is fantastic. At night a 15 minute drive to Orjanstad can get you into so wild fun, but if partying isn\'t your thing, shopping is fantastic. Overall Aruba is the total package, but is expensive.

properties.name: Fort Lauderdale, Florida
properties.description: Posted by SschelleFort Lauderdale comes in 8th place on places to vacation. This place is very crowded and very active. You spend alot of your time, riding jet ski\'s and shopping. The beach is short from hotels and there isn\'t very much room. Ft. Lauderdale is only a few hours from Key Largo if you are into scuba diving or snorkling.

properties.name: Hilton Head Island South Carolina
properties.description: Posted by SschelleHilton Head Island Comes in fifth place on the best places to vacation. The Houses here are beutiful, and the beach is relaxing. This vacation is the type that is spent with family relaxing. Night life consists of shopping, and the bar and club scene isn\'t very big. The biggest disappointment of Hilton Head island is that the food isn\'t great.

properties.name: Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
properties.description: Posted by Sschelle  Myrtle Beach comes in 9th place on the top ten places to Vacation. The food is decent with an emphasis on crab. This is a good place to come for a spring break and party. This isn\'t a good place to relax at. The beaches are crowded and there is always something going on. The shopping is decent, and the night life is wild.

properties.name: Ocean City Maryland
properties.description: Posted by SschelleOcean city comes in 10th places on the 10 best places to vacation. The food is good, with blue crab coming from the chesapeake along with fresh oysters. The night life in Ocean City is fun and you spend most of your nights on the boardwalk with shops and stores. The Major dissapointment of Ocean city is that the crowd is young and if you are looking to relax then Ocean City isn\'t the place to go.

properties.name: Sanibel Island, Florida
properties.description: Posted by SschelleSenibel Island comes in 7th place to vacation at. This is a very relaxed vacation, located on the Gulf coast the food is fantastic, but highly priced. Sanibel Doesn\'t have a night life and the shopping is pretty non existant. The sunsets of the gulf are amazing. Overall Sanibel is pretty good if you are trying to relax.

properties.name: Savannah Georgia
properties.description: Posted by SschelleThe little town of Savannah Georgia Comes in 6th place on the ten best palces to vacation. Savannah is a wealthy area that is very family oriented. The food in Savannah is spectatular, as well as the places to shop. Savannah is a historic town that dates back to the time of the revolutionary war and is full of history and is a fun place to vacation.

properties.name: grand caymans
properties.description: Posted by SschelleThe Cayman islands slid into the nubmer 2 spot. This is a very relaxing place that has alot of stuff to do. Scuba diving is some of the best in the world. The reefs are amazing along with the asortment of fish. The food is very good, but expensive. If you are every there you have to go to sting ray city and swim with sting rays, it is an amazing experience.
